title: The Seven-Year Rule
summary:
The article, "The Seven-Year Rule," explores the concept that humans undergo significant transformation every seven years due to the body's natural cell regeneration cycle. Based on a principle the author encountered in a book by the Dalai Lama, the core idea is that we are constantly becoming new versions of ourselves, shedding all our cells over roughly seven years.

The author argues that embracing this transformation can be liberating. By understanding that the person who experienced past mistakes, traumas, or missed opportunities no longer physically exists, we can release ourselves from dwelling on the past. The author illustrates this with a friend who was fixated on an event from thirty years prior, emphasizing that it was "four versions" ago.

Similarly, the author suggests that focusing on the present moment is crucial because the future self, the version of you seven years from now, is yet to be formed. This perspective encourages present-day action and mindfulness.

Ultimately, the article advocates for recognizing and honoring our continuous evolution – cellular, psychological, and spiritual. By adopting "The Seven-Year Rule," we can free ourselves from the shackles of the past and live more fully in the present, simultaneously benefiting our future selves.
chinese_title: 七年之痒
chinese_summary:
文章“七年法则”探讨了一个概念，即由于人体自然的细胞再生周期，人类每七年都会经历重大转变。基于作者在达赖喇嘛的一本书中遇到的一个原则，其核心思想是，我们不断成为自己的新版本，大约每七年就会脱落所有的细胞。

作者认为，拥抱这种转变可以带来解放。通过理解，经历过过去的错误、创伤或错失机会的人，在身体上已经不再存在，我们可以将自己从沉湎于过去中解放出来。作者用一位朋友为例，这位朋友一直执着于三十年前发生的一件事，强调那已经是“四个版本”之前的事情了。

同样，作者建议，专注于当下至关重要，因为未来的自己，也就是七年后的那个你，尚未形成。这种观点鼓励当下的行动和正念。

最终，这篇文章倡导认识并尊重我们持续的进化——细胞、心理和精神上的进化。通过采用“七年法则”，我们可以将自己从过去的束缚中解放出来，更充分地活在当下，同时也有益于我们未来的自己。

title: The VTech Socratic Method
summary:
This article details the author's exploration and modification of a VTech Socrates, a hybrid video game console/computer from 1988. The author acquired a used Socrates cheaply on eBay and found it to be filthy but surprisingly durable. After cleaning, the author disassembled the machine, revealing a Toshiba-dominated motherboard with a Z80 CPU, custom gate array, and mask ROM.

The author then tackled an AV mod, inspired by a simpler design by Johnny Blanchard. This involved designing a custom PCB with a video amplifier and voltage regulator to improve video output quality. The process was fraught with challenges, including soldering difficulties and strain relief issues.

The modified Socrates was then powered on and tested with a composite video connection, producing a decent-looking image and loud audio. The author then explored the infrared keyboard/controller, encountering quirks like unusual battery placement and a mysterious switch with an unknown function.

Finally, the author examines the "Around the World" game cartridge, discovering a mask ROM and mapping the cartridge's pinout. The author acknowledges that the pinout is currently untested. The author intends to use the identified pinout to facilitate developing custom software for the Socrates.
chinese_title: 伟易达苏格拉底教学法
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者对VTech Socrates（一款1988年的混合型视频游戏机/电脑）的探索和改造过程。作者在eBay上廉价购得一台二手Socrates，发现它非常脏但出人意料地耐用。清洁后，作者拆卸了机器，发现其主板以东芝元件为主，包括Z80 CPU、定制门阵列和掩膜ROM。

随后，作者着手进行AV改造，灵感来源于Johnny Blanchard的简化设计。这涉及设计一块带有视频放大器和电压调节器的定制PCB，以提高视频输出质量。这个过程充满了挑战，包括焊接困难和应力释放问题。

改造后的Socrates随后被通电，并通过复合视频连接进行了测试，产生了相当清晰的图像和洪亮的声音。作者接着探索了红外键盘/控制器，遇到了诸如不寻常的电池放置和功能不明的神秘开关等问题。

最后，作者检查了“环游世界”游戏卡带，发现了掩膜ROM并绘制了卡带的引脚图。作者承认，该引脚图目前尚未经过测试。作者计划利用识别出的引脚图来促进为Socrates开发定制软件。

title: Reproducibility project fails to validate dozens of biomedical studies
summary:
A large-scale reproducibility project, the Brazilian Reproducibility Initiative, involving over 50 research teams and 213 scientists across 56 Brazilian labs, attempted to replicate findings from Brazilian biomedical studies. The initiative focused on papers using common methods in Brazil, regardless of research area, perceived importance, or citation counts.

The project assessed papers published between 1998 and 2017 that utilized three methods: cell metabolism assays, genetic material amplification, and rodent maze tests. Out of 47 experiments tested, only 21% were replicable based on a set of criteria, including statistical significance and direction of results. The study also found that the effect sizes reported in the original papers were, on average, 60% larger than those observed in the replication attempts, suggesting an overestimation of effects in published research.

Coordinators of the project hope the findings will spur improvements within Brazilian science through public policy and university initiatives. While the replication rate aligns with other similar studies, this project is unique in its focus on specific methods and a particular country's research output.
chinese_title: 可重复性项目未能验证数十项生物医学研究
chinese_summary:
巴西可重复性倡议是一项大型可重复性项目，涉及50多个研究团队和分布于巴西56个实验室的213名科学家，旨在复制巴西生物医学研究的成果。该倡议侧重于在巴西使用常用方法的论文，不考虑研究领域、感知重要性或引用次数。

该项目评估了1998年至2017年间发表的、使用三种方法的论文：细胞代谢测定、遗传物质扩增和啮齿动物迷宫测试。在测试的47个实验中，只有21%的实验基于包括统计显著性和结果方向在内的一系列标准是可重复的。该研究还发现，原始论文中报告的效应量平均比复制尝试中观察到的效应量大60%，这表明已发表的研究中存在对效应的过高估计。

该项目的协调员希望这些发现能够通过公共政策和大学倡议来促进巴西科学的改进。虽然复制率与其他类似研究一致，但该项目独特之处在于它专注于特定方法和一个特定国家的研究产出。

title: Beijing seizes tiny sandbank in South China Sea
summary:
The Chinese coastguard has seized Sandy Cay, a tiny sandbank in the South China Sea, escalating tensions with the Philippines. Chinese state media released images of officers on the reef, asserting China's "maritime control" and "sovereign jurisdiction" over it. The Philippines has yet to formally respond, but the move is seen as a significant escalation in the ongoing territorial dispute between the two countries.

Sandy Cay is located near a Philippine military outpost on Thitu Island. While there are no signs of permanent Chinese occupation, the US has expressed deep concern, with a White House spokesperson warning that such actions threaten regional stability and violate international law. The US is consulting with its partners.

This event occurs amidst ongoing joint military exercises between the US and the Philippines called "Balikatan," which China has criticized as provocative. These exercises involve advanced missile systems and are intended to strengthen the Philippines' national defense, though the military insists they are not directed at any particular country. The US Defense Secretary recently reiterated Washington's commitment to its alliance with the Philippines and its determination to deter China. The South China Sea is subject to overlapping territorial claims from several nations, including China, the Philippines, Vietnam, Taiwan, Malaysia, and Brunei. China's expansive claims, marked by its "nine-dash line," have led to increased tensions and island-building activities in the region.
chinese_title: 北京控制南海一处小型沙洲
chinese_summary:
中国海警夺取南海沙洲，加剧与菲律宾紧张关系。中国官方媒体发布了海警在沙洲上的照片，宣称中国对其拥有“海上控制权”和“主权管辖权”。菲律宾尚未正式回应，但此举被视为两国持续领土争端中的一次重大升级。

沙洲位于菲律宾在中业岛上的军事前哨附近。虽然没有迹象表明中国永久占领，但美国已表达深切关注，白宫发言人警告说，此类行动威胁地区稳定并违反国际法。美国正在与其伙伴进行磋商。

此事发生在美菲正在进行的名为“肩并肩”的联合军事演习期间，中国批评该演习具有挑衅性。这些演习涉及先进的导弹系统，旨在加强菲律宾的国防，尽管军方坚称它们并非针对任何特定国家。美国国防部长最近重申了华盛顿对与菲律宾联盟的承诺以及其遏制中国的决心。南海受到包括中国、菲律宾、越南、台湾、马来西亚和文莱在内的几个国家的重叠领土主张的影响。中国以“九段线”为标志的广泛主张导致该地区紧张局势加剧和岛屿建设活动。

title: World Emulation via Neural Network
summary:
This article details the author's project of creating a "neural world" – a playable, explorable environment generated entirely by a neural network, not through traditional game development techniques. The author trained the network on video footage captured while walking a forest trail, along with motion data from their phone.

The goal was to demonstrate the unique potential of neural networks to generate worlds from real-world recordings, unlike mimicking existing video games. The initial attempts at training yielded unsatisfactory results, described as "forest-flavored soup." The author then iteratively improved the training process by adding more control information (3D motion), memory (multiple past frames), and processing the data at multiple scales. Later improvements focused on the model size, training objective (emphasizing detail generation), and training duration.

The final neural world used a dataset of 22,814 frames, a UNet model with approximately 5 million parameters, and was trained for around 100 GPU hours. The resulting world runs locally in a web browser.

The author argues that neural worlds represent a shift from creating worlds like paintings (manually crafted details) to creating them like photographs (capturing existing reality). While still in early stages, neural worlds hold the potential to become a powerful creative medium, automatically generating lifelike details based on real-world recordings. The article concludes by mentioning existing work in the field of "world models" and encouraging readers to suggest interesting capture locations near Seattle.
chinese_title: 基于神经网络的世界模拟
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者创建“神经世界”的项目——一个完全由神经网络生成的可玩、可探索的环境，而非通过传统的游戏开发技术。作者使用在森林小径上行走时拍摄的视频片段，以及来自手机的运动数据，对网络进行了训练。

目标是展示神经网络从真实世界录像中生成世界的独特潜力，而不是模仿现有的电子游戏。最初的训练尝试产生了不令人满意的结果，被描述为“森林风味的汤”。然后，作者通过添加更多控制信息（3D运动）、记忆（多个过去的帧）以及在多个尺度上处理数据，迭代地改进了训练过程。后来的改进集中在模型大小、训练目标（强调细节生成）和训练持续时间上。

最终的神经世界使用了22,814帧的数据集，一个大约有500万个参数的UNet模型，并且训练了大约100个GPU小时。最终生成的世界可以在Web浏览器中本地运行。

作者认为，神经世界代表着一种转变，从像绘画一样创造世界（手动绘制细节）到像摄影一样创造世界（捕捉现有现实）。虽然仍处于早期阶段，但神经世界具有成为强大创意媒介的潜力，可以基于真实世界的录像自动生成逼真的细节。文章最后提到了“世界模型”领域的现有工作，并鼓励读者推荐西雅图附近有趣的拍摄地点。

title: Parallel ./configure
summary: In this blog post from April 25, 2025, Tavian Barnes expresses frustration with the continued sequential nature of the `./configure` script in many software projects. He highlights the long list of individual checks performed by the script, such as verifying the presence of standard headers and functions, compiler features, and system properties. The author argues that in a time when processors have multiple cores, this linear execution is "ridiculous" and wastes significant time. The post implies a need for parallelization in the configuration process to drastically reduce the time spent in this phase of software building. Barnes does not propose a solution but instead points out the problem's persistence.
chinese_title: 并行 ./configure
chinese_summary: 2025年4月25日，Tavian Barnes 在这篇博文中表达了对许多软件项目中 `./configure` 脚本仍然采用顺序执行方式的沮丧。他强调了该脚本执行的大量独立检查，例如验证标准头文件和函数、编译器特性以及系统属性是否存在。作者认为，在处理器具有多核的时代，这种线性执行方式“荒谬”且浪费大量时间。这篇文章暗示了配置过程需要并行化，以大幅缩短软件构建阶段所花费的时间。Barnes 没有提出解决方案，而是指出了问题的持续存在。

title: Thank you for holding my duck (2021)
summary:
This article explores the origin and evolution of the phrase "Thank you for holding my duck," used to describe a problem-solving technique. The author initially believed the story originated at Bell Labs or Xerox PARC, involving a researcher explaining a problem to a colleague while they held a rubber duck. The act of explaining often led to the researcher finding the solution themselves.

The author's investigation revealed the story's true origin at Pixar, traced back through Bill Polson to Leo Hourvitz, who had heard it related to Xerox PARC. The original Xerox PARC story involved a duck used as part of a protocol, possibly to control speaking turns. However, the practice evolved, especially within Leo's team at Pixar, into a method where "holding the duck" meant passively listening while someone talked through a problem. The speaker would signal the need for this type of help by saying, "Hey [person's name], I need you to hold my duck." After finding the solution, they would simply say, "Thanks for holding my duck."

The author emphasizes that the Pixar usage of the phrase specifically implies the listener doesn't offer input. This was used frequently among a specific team within Pixar and believes the practice spread to other animation studios like Dreamworks via individuals who had learned it at Pixar. The author hopes to trace the story back to Xerox PARC definitively and welcomes any leads.
chinese_title: 感谢你替我拿鸭子（2021）
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了短语“谢谢你帮我拿着鸭子”的起源和演变，该短语用于描述一种问题解决技巧。作者最初认为这个故事起源于贝尔实验室或施乐帕克研究中心，内容是一位研究员向同事解释一个问题，同时他们拿着一只橡皮鸭。解释的过程往往让研究员自己找到解决方案。

作者的调查显示，这个故事的真正起源于皮克斯，通过比尔·波尔森追溯到利奥·霍维茨，他曾听说它与施乐帕克研究中心有关。最初的施乐帕克研究中心的故事涉及一只鸭子，用作协议的一部分，可能用于控制发言顺序。然而，这种做法演变了，尤其是在利奥在皮克斯的团队中，演变成一种方法，“拿着鸭子”意味着被动地倾听别人解决问题。说话者会通过说“嘿，[人名]，我需要你帮我拿着鸭子”来表示需要这种帮助。在找到解决方案后，他们会简单地说，“谢谢你帮我拿着鸭子”。

作者强调，皮克斯对这个短语的使用明确暗示了倾听者不提供意见。这在皮克斯的某个特定团队中经常使用，并且作者认为这种做法通过在皮克斯学习过的人传播到其他动画工作室，如梦工厂。作者希望最终能将这个故事追溯到施乐帕克研究中心，并欢迎任何线索。

title: ACM's flagship magazine seeks submissions by/for practitioners
summary:
CACM, ACM's flagship magazine, is seeking submissions for its new "Practice" section, designed to offer practitioners lasting insights into computing and improve job performance. The section aims to be co-equal with the magazine's established "Research" section. They are looking for articles covering technical advances, development practices, organizational structures, and successful systems that are relevant to a broad range of practitioners.

The articles should be practical and offer in-depth knowledge of ideas, tools, techniques, and practices, but not be vocational or tutorial in nature (i.e. detailed descriptions of specific software or programming languages). Opinion pieces are also not accepted, as CACM has a dedicated "Opinion" section.

Submissions are limited to 10 pages (roughly 6,000 words) and can have been previously posted on blogs or online platforms. Authors retain copyright and articles are published under a CC-BY license. Potential authors are encouraged to contact the co-chairs, Nachi Nagappan and Terence Kelly, to discuss their article ideas before submission. All articles will undergo review by the editorial board and outside reviewers, and be professionally edited by CACM staff. The goal is to publish articles that colleagues would enthusiastically recommend to each other.
chinese_title: ACM旗舰杂志征集从业者撰写或投稿的文章。
chinese_summary:
CACM（ACM旗舰杂志）现面向其新增的“实践”专栏征稿，旨在为从业者提供关于计算的长远见解，并提升工作绩效。该专栏力求与杂志已有的“研究”专栏并驾齐驱。他们正在寻找涵盖以下方面的文章：技术进步、开发实践、组织结构和成功的系统，这些内容应与广泛的从业者相关。

文章应具有实践性，并提供对理念、工具、技术和实践的深入了解，但不得具有职业性或教程性质（即对特定软件或编程语言的详细描述）。CACM不接受评论文章，因为其已设有专门的“观点”专栏。

投稿文章篇幅限制在10页（约6000字）以内，并且之前可以发布在博客或在线平台上。作者保留版权，文章以CC-BY许可发布。鼓励潜在作者在投稿前联系联合主席Nachi Nagappan和Terence Kelly，讨论他们的文章想法。所有文章都将经过编辑委员会和外部审稿人的审查，并由CACM工作人员进行专业编辑。目标是发表同事们会热情地互相推荐的文章。

title: Show HN: Formalizing Principia Mathematica using Lean
summary:
This "Show HN" post describes a project formalizing Bertrand Russell's *Principia Mathematica* using the Lean 4 theorem prover. The goal is to create a formalization that closely mirrors Russell's original proofs, maintaining rigor and minimizing deviations except where necessary for formalization.

The author acknowledges the complexity of *Principia Mathematica*'s Peano-Russell notation and references existing resources on it.  They emphasize that familiarity with the notation should come from observing examples of formalized formulas compared to Russell's original notation.

The author implemented a custom Lean tactic called `Syll` to mirror Russell's use of syllogistic reasoning, demonstrated with the formalization of proposition *2.16.  This tactic automates the chaining of implications, allowing Lean code to more directly reflect Russell's proof structure.

The author mentions finding a prior formalization in Coq by Landon Elkind but chose to undertake this project as a learning exercise in building mathematics from foundational principles. While acknowledging the *Principia*’s limitations, the author found the experience enriching and considers formalizing Alfred Tarski's work next. The project doesn't aim for practical application but rather for a deep understanding of constructing mathematical logic.
chinese_title: Show HN: 使用Lean形式化《数学原理》
chinese_summary:
这篇“Show HN”帖子描述了一个使用Lean 4定理证明器形式化伯特兰·罗素的《数学原理》的项目。目标是创建一个与罗素的原始证明紧密对应的形式化体系，保持严谨性，并尽可能减少偏差，除非为了形式化需要。

作者承认《数学原理》的皮亚诺-罗素符号的复杂性，并引用了关于它的现有资源。他们强调，对该符号的熟悉应该来自于观察形式化的公式与罗素原始符号的对比示例。

作者实现了一个名为`Syll`的自定义Lean策略，以模仿罗素对三段论推理的使用，并用命题*2.16*的形式化进行了演示。此策略可以自动链接蕴涵关系，使Lean代码更直接地反映罗素的证明结构。

作者提到找到了Landon Elkind之前在Coq中完成的一个形式化，但选择开展这个项目作为从基本原理构建数学的学习练习。虽然作者承认《原理》的局限性，但他发现这种经历很有收获，并考虑下一步形式化阿尔弗雷德·塔尔斯基的作品。该项目不追求实际应用，而是为了深入理解构建数理逻辑的过程。

title: Launch HN: Cua (YC X25) – Open-Source Docker Container for Computer-Use Agents
summary:
Cua (Computer-Use Agent) is an open-source framework designed to enable AI agents to control full operating systems within virtualized containers. It offers near-native performance on Apple Silicon (up to 97% speed) and supports various vision language models.

Key features include:

*   **High-Performance Virtualization:** Using the Lume CLI and Apple's Virtualization.Framework, Cua creates and runs macOS/Linux VMs.
*   **Computer-Use Interface & Agent:** Provides a framework for AI agents to interact with applications, browse the web, write code, and perform complex workflows within the VMs.

Cua provides security and isolation by running agents in dedicated virtual environments, ensuring they don't directly access the host system. It also offers flexibility through macOS and Linux support and reproducibility with consistent environments.

Installation is offered via three options: Lume CLI only (for VM management), full Computer-Use Agent capabilities via pip installs, or building from source for the latest features. The project includes several libraries like Lume, Computer, and Agent, each with specific functionalities.

Demos showcase Cua's capabilities in tasks like interacting with Claude Desktop and Tableau, multi-app workflows involving browsers and VS Code, and fixing GitHub issues in Cursor.

The project is open to contributions and is licensed under the MIT License. It utilizes Microsoft's OmniParser, licensed under CC-BY-4.0.
chinese_title: Launch HN: Cua (YC X25) – 计算机使用代理的开源 Docker 容器
chinese_summary:
Cua (计算机使用代理) 是一个开源框架，旨在使 AI 代理能够在虚拟化容器中控制完整的操作系统。它在 Apple Silicon 上提供接近原生性能（高达 97% 的速度），并支持各种视觉语言模型。

*   **计算机使用界面与代理：** 提供一个框架，供 AI 代理与应用程序交互、浏览网页、编写代码，并在虚拟机内执行复杂的工作流程。

Cua 通过在专用虚拟环境中运行代理来提供安全性和隔离性，确保它们无法直接访问宿主机系统。它还通过 macOS 和 Linux 支持以及一致的环境来实现灵活性和可重复性。

安装提供三种选择：仅限 Lume CLI（用于虚拟机管理），通过 pip 安装实现完整的计算机使用代理功能，或者从源代码构建以获取最新功能。该项目包含多个库，如 Lume、Computer 和 Agent，每个库都具有特定的功能。

演示展示了 Cua 在诸如与 Claude Desktop 和 Tableau 交互、涉及浏览器和 VS Code 的多应用工作流程，以及在 Cursor 中修复 GitHub 问题等任务中的能力。

title: Finding Paths of Least Action with Gradient Descent
summary:
This article explores a less common approach to physics problems: minimizing the action to find the path of least action, which represents the physical trajectory of a system. It contrasts this method with standard analytical and numerical approaches, using the example of a free body in a gravitational field.

The Lagrangian method, which utilizes the action, is highlighted as a powerful tool used across various physics branches. Instead of using the Euler-Lagrange equation to find the path of stationary action, the article proposes a direct minimization of the action using gradient descent. This involves discretizing the action integral into a sum and approximating derivatives with finite differences, enabling numerical computation with tools like PyTorch.

The article provides a simple implementation demonstrating how to initialize a random path for a falling particle and then use gradient descent to minimize the action, resulting in a parabolic path matching the solution obtained via traditional ODE integration. It also emphasizes that this approach, though illustrated with a simple example, demonstrates a fundamental principle shaping the physical universe. The article concludes by suggesting that future posts will delve into more complex classical simulations and quantum mechanics and discuss the implications of this principle.
chinese_title: 梯度下降法寻找最小作用量路径
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了一种解决物理问题的不太常见的方法：最小化作用量以寻找最小作用量路径，该路径代表系统的物理轨迹。 它将此方法与标准的分析和数值方法进行对比，并以引力场中的自由物体为例进行了说明。

文中重点介绍了利用作用量的拉格朗日方法，该方法是各种物理分支中使用的强大工具。 本文没有使用欧拉-拉格朗日方程来寻找平稳作用量路径，而是提出使用梯度下降法直接最小化作用量。 这涉及到将作用量积分离散化为求和，并使用有限差分近似导数，从而可以使用 PyTorch 等工具进行数值计算。

本文提供了一个简单的实现，演示了如何初始化一个坠落粒子的随机路径，然后使用梯度下降法来最小化作用量，从而得到一条与通过传统 ODE 积分获得的解相匹配的抛物线路径。 它还强调，虽然此方法用一个简单的例子说明，但它演示了一个塑造物理宇宙的基本原理。 文章最后建议，未来的文章将深入探讨更复杂的经典模拟和量子力学，并讨论该原理的含义。

title: The Gruen Transfer is consuming the internet
summary:
Sebastian's blog post discusses the "Gruen Transfer," a phenomenon where a confusing layout disorients customers and leads them to impulsive purchases. Originally observed in physical stores, the Gruen Transfer is now prevalent online, particularly on platforms like Facebook.

The author argues that the Facebook feed, initially intended to simplify updates, has become a confusing mix of ads, memes, and influencer content, diverting users from their original purpose and leading to "doom scrolling." He extends this observation to other websites, where design choices aim to disorient visitors and encourage impulsive behavior, citing Wikipedia rabbit holes as a benign example.

The Gruen Transfer also manifests as UX dark patterns, such as deliberately complicated processes for deleting accounts or canceling subscriptions. The author questions whether the increasing complexity and friction will eventually become detrimental, drawing a parallel to the Laffer Curve.

He highlights the EU's legislation requiring equal ease for subscribing and canceling services and suggests "complexity" as a useful measure for future legislation. The author concludes with a call for similar considerations in everyday situations, like navigating a confusing pharmacy.
chinese_title: 格伦转换正在吞噬互联网。
chinese_summary:
塞巴斯蒂安的博文讨论了“格鲁恩转换”现象，这种现象指的是令人困惑的布局使顾客迷失方向，并导致冲动购买。最初在实体店观察到的格鲁恩转换现象，现在在网上也很普遍，尤其是在 Facebook 等平台上。

作者认为，最初旨在简化更新的 Facebook 信息流，已经变成了广告、表情包和网红内容的混乱混合体，分散了用户最初的目的，并导致“末日滚动”。 他将这种观察扩展到其他网站，这些网站的设计选择旨在迷惑访问者并鼓励冲动行为，并以维基百科的兔子洞作为一个良性例子。

格鲁恩转换也表现为 UX 黑暗模式，例如故意复杂的删除帐户或取消订阅流程。 作者质疑日益增长的复杂性和摩擦最终是否会变得有害，并将其与拉弗曲线进行类比。

他强调了欧盟立法要求订阅和取消服务同样容易，并建议将“复杂性”作为未来立法的有用衡量标准。 作者最后呼吁在日常生活中也应考虑类似的情况，例如在令人困惑的药房中导航。

title: I wrote to the address in the GPLv2 license notice (2022)
summary:
In 2022, the author, curious about the physical address listed in the GPLv2 license notice, decided to write to the Free Software Foundation (FSF) at 51 Franklin Street, Boston, to see what would happen. The author's initial research on Stack Exchange revealed the address existed because the GPLv2 was published in 1991 when internet access was less prevalent, and physical media was the primary way to distribute software.

The author detailed the challenges of sending a letter to the US from the UK, including the discontinuation of international reply coupons and the need to purchase US stamps on eBay. This led to a brief and confusing foray into the world of stamp collecting.

After a few weeks, the author received a reply from the FSF containing the full text of the GNU General Public License. However, the author received the GPLv3 instead of the GPLv2. The paper was printed on US letter-sized paper, further highlighting the geographical difference. The author questions whether the inclusion of the physical address in the license notice should have indicated that they were seeking the older GPLv2 license, or if the author should have explicitly requested the version. Despite the error and the effort involved, the author was satisfied with the experience and concluded that they would not pursue a correction. The author also joked about needing time to recover from the postal interaction.
chinese_title: 我给GPLv2许可声明中的地址写了信 (2022)
chinese_summary:
2022年，作者出于对GPLv2许可协议中列出的实际地址的好奇，决定致信位于波士顿富兰克林街51号的自由软件基金会（FSF），以观其变。作者在Stack Exchange上的初步研究显示，该地址的存在是因为GPLv2发布于1991年，当时互联网的普及程度较低，物理介质是分发软件的主要方式。

作者详细描述了从英国寄信到美国的挑战，包括国际回信券的停用以及需要在eBay上购买美国邮票。这导致了一次短暂而令人困惑的邮票收集之旅。

几周后，作者收到了来自FSF的回信，其中包含GNU通用公共许可证的完整文本。然而，作者收到的是GPLv3，而不是GPLv2。纸张是用美式信纸尺寸打印的，进一步突出了地理差异。作者质疑许可证通知中包含实际地址是否应该表明他们正在寻求旧版本的GPLv2许可证，或者作者是否应该明确请求该版本。尽管存在错误以及付出的努力，作者对这次经历感到满意，并得出结论，他们不会寻求更正。作者还开玩笑说需要时间从这次邮政互动中恢复过来。

title: Reimagining Democracy
summary:
Bruce Schneier's "Reimagining Democracy" explores the need to rethink governmental structures in the face of rapidly advancing technologies, particularly AI. He describes a workshop series he organized to discuss radical alternatives to modern representative democracy, acknowledging its limitations in the 21st century due to outdated assumptions about communication and travel.

Key themes emerging from the workshops include combating misinformation, questioning the optimization of political systems for economic gain, and examining the evolving relationship between capitalism and democracy in the information age. A central focus is the potential impact of AI, considering scenarios from AI-driven traffic management to AI legislators, and questioning the future role of humans in governance.

The workshops also considered alternative democratic models like sortition (randomly selecting officials) and liquid democracy (transferable voting proxies). Discussions extended to issues of inclusivity, such as giving a voice to future generations and non-human entities, and addressed the need for governmental systems resistant to manipulation and focused on aligning individual and collective interests.

Schneier emphasizes that these discussions, while speculative, are valuable for prompting radical thinking beyond incremental improvements to current systems. He argues that the stakes are high, especially given existential threats like climate change, and encourages exploring discontinuous changes to avoid getting stuck at local maxima. The workshop will reconvene in December 2025.
chinese_title: 重塑民主
chinese_summary:
布鲁斯·施奈尔的《重塑民主》探讨了面对快速发展的技术，特别是人工智能，重新思考政府机构的必要性。他描述了他组织的一系列研讨会，旨在讨论现代代议制民主的激进替代方案，并承认其在21世纪因沟通和旅行方面的过时假设而产生的局限性。

研讨会的主要主题包括打击虚假信息、质疑为经济利益而优化政治体系、以及考察信息时代资本主义与民主之间不断演变的关系。一个中心焦点是人工智能的潜在影响，考虑了从人工智能驱动的交通管理到人工智能立法者的各种场景，并质疑人类在治理中的未来角色。

研讨会还考虑了其他民主模式，如抽签制（随机选择官员）和流动民主制（可转让的投票代理权）。讨论延伸到包容性问题，例如赋予未来世代和非人类实体发言权，并探讨了建立能够抵御操纵并专注于协调个人和集体利益的政府体系的需求。

施奈尔强调，这些讨论虽然具有推测性，但对于促进超越当前系统渐进改进的激进思考非常有价值。他认为，鉴于气候变化等生存威胁，风险很高，并鼓励探索不连续的变化，以避免陷入局部最优。该研讨会将于2025年12月再次召开。

title: Amazon Japan ordered to pay 35M. yen for allowing listing of fakes
summary:
A Japanese court has ordered Amazon Japan to pay 35 million yen ($244,000) in damages for allowing the sale of counterfeit products on its platform. The lawsuit, brought by medical equipment manufacturer Try and E Co. and its distributor Excel Plan Co., claimed that sales of their pulse oximeters declined due to the availability of fake items on Amazon.

The Tokyo District Court focused on Amazon Japan's obligation to monitor listings and remove counterfeit goods. Judge Yuko Shintani ruled that Amazon failed to take effective measures against counterfeits despite being aware of them.

The case stemmed from an incident in 2021 where Excel Plan was selling a genuine pulse oximeter on Amazon, while another seller listed a counterfeit version on the same page for significantly less. Because Amazon's system prioritizes the lowest price, the fake product gained more visibility, hindering Excel Plan's sales. Despite Excel Plan reporting the issue, Amazon deleted the page for the genuine product, preventing further sales.

While Try and E was involved in the lawsuit, only Excel Plan was awarded compensation. The lawyer representing the plaintiffs hailed the ruling as a landmark, acknowledging the obligation of platforms like Amazon to implement proper authentication systems, as businesses increasingly rely on these platforms.
chinese_title: 亚马逊日本因允许上架假冒商品被责令支付3500万日元。
chinese_summary:
日本法院判决亚马逊日本公司赔偿3500万日元（约24.4万美元），原因是该公司允许在其平台上销售假冒产品。医疗设备制造商Try and E Co.及其经销商Excel Plan Co.提起的诉讼称，由于亚马逊上存在假冒商品，他们的脉搏血氧仪销量下降。

东京地方法院的重点是亚马逊日本公司有义务监控商品列表并删除假冒商品。法官新谷祐子裁定，亚马逊明知存在假冒商品，但未能采取有效措施加以制止。

此案源于2021年发生的一起事件，Excel Plan在亚马逊上销售正品脉搏血氧仪，而另一家卖家在同一页面上以低得多的价格列出了假冒版本。由于亚马逊的系统优先考虑最低价格，假冒产品获得了更高的曝光率，阻碍了Excel Plan的销售。尽管Excel Plan报告了这个问题，亚马逊还是删除了正品产品的页面，阻止了进一步的销售。

虽然Try and E参与了诉讼，但只有Excel Plan获得了赔偿。代表原告的律师称赞该裁决具有里程碑意义，承认像亚马逊这样的平台有义务实施适当的认证系统，因为越来越多的企业依赖这些平台。

title: A $20k American-made electric pickup with no paint, no stereo, no screen
summary:
The Slate Truck is an upcoming American-made electric pickup truck aiming to disrupt the auto market with its radical simplicity and low price point of under $20,000 after federal incentives. Scheduled for production next year, the two-seater truck boasts a 150-mile range, a bed capable of holding a sheet of plywood, and a deliberately minimalist design.

Key features include a lack of paint, stereo, and touchscreen, embracing a "digital detox" approach. Body panels are made of injection-molded polypropylene composite, designed to be durable and customizable through vinyl wraps. The truck's design prioritizes personalization, allowing owners to customize its appearance and functionality with DIY kits, including an SUV upgrade.

Slate Auto aims to simplify manufacturing by eliminating the paint shop and stamping processes. The company focuses on producing a single trim level in one color, simplifying factory operations and reducing costs.

The truck omits infotainment features to boost reliability and encourages DIY maintenance, supported by Slate University. For more complex issues, a partnership with a nationwide service center network will be available.

Sales will be direct to consumers, bypassing traditional dealerships, with pickup centers or home delivery options. Slate Auto has attracted major investors, including reportedly Jeff Bezos, due to its lean business model. The primary question is whether consumers are ready for a stripped-down, highly customizable EV that prioritizes affordability and simplicity over luxury and technology.
